document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2012-04
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING CHAPTER 2.02 ENTITLED "MAYOR" BY MODIFYING SECTION 2.02.030 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE INCREASING THE MAYOR'S TERM OF OFFICE FROM TWO YEARS TO FOUR YEARS EFFECTIVE NOVEMBER 2012
